default.title: THE HUDDLE EXPLAINED
paragraph: We exist to provide a source of livelihood, bridge the educational gap in the society and promote interest for the sport in women. American football is emerging as one of the keys to holistic social development as it fosters inclusion, cohesion, tolerance and strengthens an atmosphere of mutual co-existence.
There are only a handful of initiatives (governmental and non-governmental) that use sports as a vehicle to drive development and NAFA was established to become one of those drivers.

American Football is vastly gaining prominence in Africa, this realization has caused us to become fully aware of the potential opportunities that the sports avails as well as the latent talent innate in Africans waiting to be harnessed. We decided that the best way to plug into these opportunities will be to create an umbrella organization for American football in Nigeria that serves as a platform for partnering with relevant organisations and agencies to aid the driving and achieving of its fundamental goals.
text: It is pertinent at this point to note that The American Football Association of Nigeria is driven to ensure the actualization of sustainable development goals and within our vision, mission and objectives lie inherently the following goals:

items.title: GOAL 3
heading: GOOD HEALTH
AND WELL-BEING
items.text: Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages

items.title: GOAL 4
heading: QUALITY
EDUCATION
items.text: Ensure inclusive and equitable quality education and promote lifelong learning opportunities for all

items.title: GOAL 5
heading: GENDER
EQUALITY
items.text: Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls

items.title: GOAL 8
heading: DECENT WORK AND
ECONOMIC GROWTH
items.text: Promote sustained, inclusive and sustainable economic growth, full and productive employment and decent work for all

items.title: GOAL 9
heading: INDUSTRY, INNOVATION,
AND INFRASTRUCTURE
items.text: To build resilient infrastructure, promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization, and encourage innovation.

items.title: GOAL 11
heading: SUSTAINABLE CITIES
AND COMMUNITIES
items.text: Making cities and human settlements inclusive, safe, resilient, and sustainable. It emphasizes on improving urban planning, providing affordable housing, ensuring access to green spaces, and enhancing public transportation.

items.title: GOAL 16
heading: PEACE, JUSTICE AND
STRONG INSTITUTIONS
items.text: Seeks to promote peaceful and inclusive societies, ensure access to justice for everyone, and establish effective, accountable, and inclusiveÂ institutions.

items.title: GOAL 17
heading: PARTNERSHIPS FOR
THE GOALS
items.text: Strengthen the means of implementation and revitalize the global partnership for sustainable development.
